mapper.insert: insert into surgery ( surgery_idx, nickName_idx, category, name, price ) values ( surgery_seq.nextval, #{nickName_idx}, #{category}, #{name}, #{price} )
mapper.select: select * from surgery where nickName_idx = #{nickName_idx} and category = #{category}
mapper.update: update surgery set photo = #{ photo } where nickName_idx = #{ nickName_idx } and category = #{category} and name = #{name}
